snippet.title: Slider - Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
A free demo is available on Steam now! It would mean the world if you could try it out, wishlist the game, or tell a friend!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1916890/Slider/?utm_source=yt

Slide pieces of the world to solve puzzles and help others. Control an ever-growing set of tiles and mechanics. Explore nine unique areas, unravel the mysteries of the universe, and reconnect the world -- one slider at a time.
